_description: Paradoxes of faith — two short couplets with Latin prose comments to the right in John Grimestone’s sermon notes

NLS18721.Transcription:
Deth is lifePes his strifSorth is long& feble is
                    strong
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 28.
